front.title: IEEE Standard for Authenticated Encryption with Length Expansion for Storage Devices

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard specifies cryptographic and data authentication procedures for storage devices that support length-expansion, such as tape drives. Such procedures include the following cryptographic modes of operation for the AES block cipher: CCM, GCM, CBC-HMAC, and XTS-HMAC.
